subject: Horse Racing
Women and Girls
Horses
Belmont Stakes
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Linda Rice became the first woman to win a training title at Saratoga or any top-tier track, defeating Todd Pletcher in the summer meet.
snippet: Linda Rice became the first woman to win a training title at Saratoga or any top-tier track, defeating Todd Pletcher in the summer meet.
